body:
Comment 3: 
This is not ambiguous: chan <-chan T has a
meaning in the language grammar, and what's
more, the compiler has used the spacing to
indicate what that meaning is: it wrote

    chan <-chan func(int)

instead of

    chan<- chan func(int)  // doesn't mean what it looks like

No other types are over-parenthesized during printing.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
